nodes.text: Igma Kotos was a resident of Mos Taike.

During 1 ABY, Igma Kotos resided in Mos Taike. One of her friends who worked for the Corellia Times was being roughed up by a local resident. Worried that he and the town would receive bad press, Lorne Prestar tasked a spacer to "teach the thug a lesson."

Igma Kotos appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
